content: linear: Focused entirely on project planning and task definition within the elizaos/eliza repository this month. They created 18 issues to scope new features like a CLI run command (#5573), outline documentation needs (#5638), and flag critical bugs and CI failures for resolution (#5714, #5715). This work was instrumental in defining the development roadmap and identifying necessary improvements across the project. Their efforts indicate a focus on the CLI, documentation, and CI processes.
